de.uniba.kinf.jerusalem.gui.controller

Class JerMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniba.kinf.jerusalem.gui.controller.JerMainController

  • public class JerMainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates JerMainModel, JerMapComponent, JerMainView, and all: JerModel, JerTableModel, JerWorkPanel, JerTableContainer ; establishes observer relation: JerTableModels, JerWorkPanels, JerMapComponent, JerTabbedPane as observer of JerMainModel.
    Author:
    Hanno Wierichs
